Grand Master Helminter:
Congratulations! With this, you have become a genuine Dark Elf elite warrior for the first time. Though you are a new Palus Knight and everything is still unfamiliar, you will develop exceptional swordsmanship if you pursue the skill diligently. You can also learn skills one by one from the masters nearby.
Never forget the pride and honor of a Dark Elf elite warrior and fight bravely. May Shilen, the goddess of darkness and the first goddess of water, always be with you...
Our guild has prepared this small present to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a Shadow Weapon.
